name: 1 Channel information
description:
Add channel ID as node.

You can use the search preset to find a channel ID or take the last part of an URL, e.g.the last part of https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpXaqdaawHUyujeSG1Wnm8Q

If you don't have the channel ID but the user name, remove the id parameter and add a parameter named "forUsername" with the value "<Object ID>". The user name can be found in the last part of URLs like https://www.youtube.com/user/MoritzTV

See https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/docs/channels/list for further information about channels.
